dynamic-query.hql-query: from PushPost p where p.memberSn=:memberSn order by p.id desc
select count(*) from PushPost p where p.memberSn=:memberSn
dynamic-query.native-query: select * from newsfeeds_member_post p where p.id in ( <#list postIds as item> ${item} <#if item_has_next>,</#if> </#list>)

SELECT l.* FROM newsfeeds_member_like l WHERE l.post_id IN ( <#list postIds as item> ${item} <#if item_has_next>,</#if> </#list>) AND (l.member_sn = :memberSn OR (SELECT relation_status FROM connects_member_relation r WHERE r.my_member_sn = :memberSn AND r.friend_member_sn = l.member_sn) in ('10','11')) ORDER BY l.id ASC

SELECT c.* FROM feeds_member_push_comment pc, newsfeeds_member_comment c WHERE pc.comment_id = c.id AND pc.member_sn = :memberSn AND c.post_id IN(<#list postIds as item> ${item} <#if item_has_next>,</#if> </#list>) ORDER BY c.id ASC
dynamic-query.hql-query: from NewsfeedsPost p where p.memberSn=:memberSn order by p.id desc
select count(*) from NewsfeedsPost p where p.memberSn=:memberSn
dynamic-query.native-query: SELECT p.*, f.fandom_name, f.fandom_avatar_url FROM feeds_member_post_fandom p, feeds_fandom f WHERE p.fandom_id = f.id AND p.id IN ( <#list postIds as item> ${item} <#if item_has_next>,</#if> </#list>)

select p.* from newsfeeds_member_post p, feeds_member_push_post mp where p.id = mp.post_id and mp.member_sn = :memberSn <#if (sinceId >0) > and p.id > :sinceId </#if> <#if (maxId >0) > and p.id < :maxId </#if> order by p.id desc

select count(*) from newsfeeds_member_post p, feeds_member_push_post mp where p.id = mp.post_id and mp.member_sn = :memberSn <#if (sinceId >0) > and p.id > :sinceId </#if> <#if (maxId >0) > and p.id < :maxId </#if>
SELECT count(1) FROM newsfeeds_member_like WHERE member_sn =:memberSn AND post_id =:postId
